direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods set internal state variables (predicate and iterator) and reset related state (nextObject and nextObjectSet).
Both methods deal with the predicate, one setting it and the other retrieving it.
The hasNext() method relies on the predicate set by setPredicate() to determine if there is a next element that matches the predicate.
The next() method uses the predicate set by setPredicate() to retrieve the next element that matches the predicate.
The setNextObject() method uses the predicate set by setPredicate() to find the next object that matches the predicate.
